title: I Feel Like Zoe May Be a Bit Too Strong
body: I'm not saying that she is amazing in Solo Q or anything, but in competitive she is picked a lot and seems to dominate when picked. She offers a little too much pick potential from such a safe position. I really think her E needs a late game cooldown nerf. It just seems up way too frequently for how strong the ability is.

replies.body:
Or, there is legit nothing to pick aside from fricking cassiopeia and lissandra.
By the way, that TSM fight? 5 kill Zoe and the crowd goes crazy, but 0/3/4 Aatrox 1v3ing and ending the game nobody bats a eye lmao
Rule No.34 of league: Nobody likes Zoe.

> [{quoted}](name=General Matty,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBOoplTB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-04T12:34:15.675+0000)
>
> Rule No.34 of league: Nobody likes Zoe.

Rule No.69 of league: Nobody likes Yasuo.

1. She's severely item dependent.

2.Squishy and immobile has no escape unless she holds on to flash from a minion.

3.all her abilities are skillshots except passive w and r.

4.Items like banshees merch treads ect make zoe's life a lot harder

5.cleanse just completely negates her from landing her full combo ( long range q to someone that fell for sleepy trouble bubble)

6. And just about any champion with a dash makes her life a lot harder

i hope this helps you deal with her better :)

overall she a very niche pick 'cause she can't just be picked in any match and is incredibely good on the RIGHT hands but nothing that can't be dealt with.
I did not say anything about me having issues with her in my own games. I was talking about how in competitive/professional LoL she seems too strong.
Ye it was funny , even Casters they said she is annoying af taking 3/4 of their HP by hitting only Q from the jungle

There is no

> Bit Too Strong

concerning Zoe.

A) She's a dominatnt pick ruining everyones day being completely obnoxious to play against during every single stage of the game!

B) She's garbage and is nothing but walking money for the opponent. 

There's is no space in between! 

Bad gamedesign at work!
